typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Id as string,
		{ Name} as string,
		{ Salary} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true) ~> schemasource
schemasource sink(input(
		Id as string,
		{ Name} as string,
		{ Salary} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['row_salary_data'],
	mapColumn(
		Id,
		{ Name},
		{ Salary}
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
